item.title: Kinetic LED Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are exploring "Kinetic" video walls for our upcoming show taking place July 20th.

Here is a Sample Video: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1oQ83_fQxkmZRLPE5lWOuq9jVC-rod8wo/view?usp=sharing

I have attached two more sample videos as well as the specs for our Kinetic video wall.

Basically we would be providing you with the videos (Corporate Overview, various logos, and standard videos we already have) and we’d need you to do the rest to ensure the videos look correct on the kinetic wall. We are also open to any and all suggestions.

We are not sure how many videos we would like created as this really depends on how long it takes to create one video. At a minimum we would like 3-4 videos if possible. These can range from 30 seconds to 5 minutes.

Here are standard videos we use, we would like to work with the videos that will work the best for the Kinetic video wall:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1V8wjGEEUW48qL2obt8V03NCrNNq46wvl?usp=sharing

Looking forward to any comments or questions!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:03 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing and Instagram Upload - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a candidate who can download, alter, and re-upload videos to Instagram accounts. All training needed for this will be provided upon interest.

The ideal candidate should have experience working with video editing software (either from Phone or PC) and be familiar with Instagram's and TikTok video requirements.

his project requires someone who can quickly understand our editing style and maintain consistency across multiple accounts. The ability to meet deadlines and communicate effectively is also important. If you are passionate about video editing and have a strong understanding of Instagram, we would love to hear from you.

We're looking for someone to work about 4-6 hrs per day, consistently. Previous experience is not needed, but consistency, english speaking and a good internet connection is needed

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00

item.title: Video editor - Upwork
item.description:
looking for a video editor working remotely must know Arabic and English languages

Position Overview:
As a Remote Video Editor, you will be responsible for producing high-quality video content tailored for social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, and others. You will work closely with our content creators, social media managers, and marketing team to ensure our video content is compelling, visually appealing, and on-brand.

Key Responsibilities:

Edit and assemble raw footage into polished videos for social media channels.
Create engaging and attention-grabbing video content, including but not limited to promotional videos, reels, stories, ads, and more.
Collaborate with the creative team to develop video concepts and storyboards.
Add graphics, animations, music, and sound effects to enhance video quality.
Ensure all video content aligns with brand guidelines and social media best practices.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in social media and video editing software.
Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Receive and implement feedback from team members and clients.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Video Editor, preferably with a focus on social media content.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, or similar tools.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their specific video requirements.
Creative mindset with an eye for detail and visual storytelling.
Ability to work independently and remotely, managing time effectively.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
A portfolio showcasing your video editing work, particularly for social media.



here is examples for the work we want like
https://www.facebook.com/share/r/rh3Tvac3XL4PzhdV/?mibextid=UalRPS
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMMcdrX1U/


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Real Estate Video, CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Real Estate Video, CapCut, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Testimonial Video
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Youtube video editor - Upwork
item.description:
In search of a professional and experienced video editor to handle the full video creation process, producing high quality Youtube content/videos in length of around 10 minutes, 30 videos produced per month.

*Please read this carefully before applying for this job.*

The ideal candidate/team will have worked on YouTube automation channels before with measurable success, have extensive knowledge of Youtube guidelines/copyright rules/fair use policies, strong editing skills and access to Stock Footage sites as well as experience with and use of VidIQ or Tubebuddy. Videos must be able to be monetized.

We Want to Work With You If:
- You have experience in producing bingeable content with Youtube.
- You understand how to keep viewers engaged with good pacing, transitions etc.
- You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You are organized, communicative and has fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/Monday.com/Trello)
- You have a sense of humor

Video requirements:
- Video workflow: 10 second bait intro, channel intro, follow IG/subscribe pop ups, and then keep the content in the body edited in a way that is funny, engaging and entertaining.  Ending with channel end screens.
- Add in copyright free sound effects/background music where applicable, not in excess.
- Source and use copyright free clips and have stock footage access to use licensed clips.
- Edit the video in a bingeable type style that is captivating to the audience, CTR and retention rate focused, 1080p HD+, make use of lower-thirds/text/transitions where applicable. Professional video editing software only - Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve or Final Cut Pro.

Why we are awesome to work with:
- You'll fill your portfolio with a variety of professional video samples
- We have high-quality standards, which means awesome training – you'll learn a ton
- Work from wherever you want (as long as we can reach you)
- There is PLENTY of work to go around, and no cap on what you can edit
- We recognize talent and promote from within
- Kickass bonuses and incentives

Job requirements:
- 2 videos per week
- 8 minutes + videos
- $20 per video

Priority given to the video editor that best matches the Job Description. Budget is $20 per video, negotiable for higher pay for **proven work of high quality and results based track record**.

Please send current portfolio/sample work for review.



Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Explainer Video, Performance Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production
Skills: Explainer Video, Performance Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Video Production
Country: NLD
click to apply

item.description:

This a complete execution project, where you will be responsible to creating the complete videos on topics provided by us.

You should have experience or a team with:

- Voice Over Artists

item.title: Need Long term Video Editor For Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We have a channel that focuses on sharing the LATEST recent news on the downfall of American economy and rise of Chinese economy.


We want to be uploading at least x3 vides per week, and this frequency will increase over time.
We want someone who has knowledge of economic/political space and is able to showcase the video concepts in a visually appealing manner.  
As mentioned our budget is $15 per video, but happy to negotiate this based on your video editing experience and style. Our videos are generally 13 minutes long.

Also must be able to communicate easily in English and get on a zoom call.

Here’s a google docs with the step by step instructions to how the content will be made:
(https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-ahKBdrcljCGhyMoxvi0f15YzfMvxJOqkXoYHV7W3xI/edit)
NOTE: GO OVER THIS DOCUMENT COMPLETELY! It's exactly how we want the videos to be made.


I know a lot of people just send proposals without reading the Job post, so be sure to put "Geo/VIDEO" in the beginning of your proposal or otherwise I will not be reading it.

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Logo Design and Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual who can create a unique and eye-catching logo for our company. The ideal candidate should also have experience in video editing to create engaging promotional videos. The logo should reflect our brand identity and leave a lasting impression on our target audience. The video editing skills will be utilized to produce high-quality videos that effectively communicate our message. The candidate should be able to work collaboratively with our team, understand our vision, and translate it into visually appealing designs.    

Skills required:
- Logo design
- Video editing

item.title: Youtube Short Videos - Video Editing 100+ Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
Searching for a video editor to generate 100 youtube shorts for my Dog Lovers Youtube Channel.  These videos will be between 30-60 seconds long, most about 45 seconds.  They will be in a 9:16 format.


Examples include:
https://youtube.com/shorts/ercv7k9WHPg?feature=share
https://youtube.com/shorts/tn_OytBv3YE?feature=share
https://youtube.com/shorts/gfagJzdCQkM?feature=share

INSTRUCTIONS:
- I will provide script
- I will provide narration

- You will find relevant footage (minimal images if any)
- You will add a background music, and ensure steady volume throughout the video.
- You will add subtitles to video (matching style and format in samples)  I use Kapwing for the above samples.

PAYMENT:
- I will pay $1 per video.
- Milestones will be 20 video delivery per milestone.

HIRING IMMEDIATLY!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Social Media Manager to join our team. As a Social Media Manager, you will be responsible for creating engaging video and static image content, as well as delivering posts to various Facebook, Telegram, and WhatsApp groups. Your main goal will be to increase brand awareness and drive user engagement through social media platforms to recruit potential new licensees and current licensees to our company PHP Agency one of the USA's largest and fastest growing insurance companies founded by Patrick bet David who runs the #1 podcast and youtube channel for business content in the nation.. Also we may want to have you help us to generate national clientele for our life insurance and annuity products as well as some of our college planning and debt consolidation products. To succeed in this role, you should have a creative mindset and a good understanding of social media trends. Excellent communication and organizational skills are also essential. If you are passionate about social media marketing and can work independently, we would love to hear from you!

Responsibilities:
- Create compelling video and static image content
- Join facebook, Telegram and Whatsapp groups for us to post content in
- Deliver posts to Facebook, Telegram, and WhatsApp groups
- Increase brand awareness and drive user engagement
- Stay up-to-date with social media trends

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Social Media Manager
- Knowedge of leveragig tools like Buffer, Hootsuite and others to quickly deliver content along multiple platforms several times a week and help plan out scheduled delivery of content throuout the year.
- Proficient in video editing software
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Hourly Range: $4.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:33 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Buffer, HootSuite, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Buffer, HootSuite, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
🎯 We are looking for a Video editor who can

Understand our story and narrative
Envision the the final video and storyboard it
Create the video using stock videos and images
Take feedback and make necessary changes

What You'll Do 🎥
Craft compelling stories through video editing, utilizing stock videos and images to enhance our brand narrative.
Collaborate with the team to understand the vision and create visually stunning videos that resonate with our audience.
Bring creative concepts to life, adding a dynamic and engaging visual layer to our platform's promotional content.
Ensure a high level of quality, creativity, and consistency across all video projects.

You'd be a Great Fit 💡 if:
Proven Experience: You have a strong portfolio showcasing your video editing skills, particularly in transforming stock footage into captivating narratives.
Creative Vision: Your ability to conceptualize and implement creative ideas sets you apart. You have a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.
Tech Savvy: Proficient in video editing software and tools, with a good understanding of current video trends and techniques.
Collaborative Spirit: You thrive in a team environment, working closely with other creatives and content creators to bring ideas to life.
Adaptability: Can adapt to evolving project requirements and timelines in a fast-paced environment.

We understand that it's hard to check all boxes , what matters most to us is the mindset of "we will figure it out" and the commitment to doing whatever it takes to create exceptional designs.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: IND
click to apply

item.title: Facebook Ad Video Editor For Lead Generation - Upwork
item.description:
👋 HEY YOU! Are you a creative editor with a knack for crafting compelling video ads? We’re looking for a talented Facebook Video Ad Editor to join our remote team and help us revolutionize the life insurance marketing industry. If you’re passionate about creating attention-grabbing ads that drive engagement and conversions, we want to hear from you!

🎬 What You’ll Be Doing:

• Transforming raw ad footage into high-converting video ads.
• Creating eye-catching photo ad graphics using Canva and Photoshop.
• Developing ads that capture attention on social media and encourage users to click and engage.
• Utilizing your deep understanding of Facebook and TikTok Ad Creatives to optimize ad performance.

🎁 What We Offer:

• Competitive hourly rate of $8 - $15, depending on skill level.
• The opportunity to work remotely from anywhere.
• A chance to be part of a dynamic, growing team.
• The potential for career growth as we expand our operations.

✅ You’re Probably a Match If You Have:

• Proven experience in editing and creating Facebook and TikTok ads.
• Fluency in English.
• Proficiency in Adobe editing software, Canva, and Photoshop.
• A strong eye for design and a deep understanding of what makes an ad successful on social media.

🌟 About Us:

We are a fast-growing startup in the life insurance marketing industry, dedicated to transforming the way people view and purchase life insurance. Our mission is to empower insurance agents with the knowledge, support, and resources they need to achieve time, location, and financial freedom. Our core values guide us in our journey:

• 💼 Do The Boring Work: We focus on steady progress through small improvements and disciplined processes, rather than chasing after flashy innovations.
• 🏆 Competitive Excellence: We have a relentless drive to achieve and maintain superior performance and avoid mediocrity at all costs.
• 🤝 Unwavering Integrity: We always act with honesty, fairness, and respect towards others even in the face of adversity or selfish temptation.
• 🔍 See Problems, Seek Solutions: We focus on finding solutions instead of complaining about the problems at hand.
• 💪 Extreme Ownership: We take full responsibility for achieving our shared goals and hold each other accountable for team success. We empower all team members to make decisions based on our vision and mission statement.

If you’re ready to make an impact and help us achieve our ambitious goals, apply now!

Hourly Range: $8.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Canva
Skills: Video Commercial, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Canva
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Download Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled individual who can help us download high-resolution videos from YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of YouTube's video downloading policies and should be able to ensure that the downloaded videos are of the highest quality possible. This job requires attention to detail and the ability to troubleshoot any technical issues that may arise during the downloading process.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in YouTube video downloading tools
    - Knowledge of video formats and resolutions
    - Familiarity with copyright laws and fair use policies
    - Strong problem-solving skills

    Size: Small
    Duration: Done in less than an hour
    Expertise: Beginner to Intermediate

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Data Entry, Python, WordPress, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Data Entry, Python, WordPress, Video Production

item.title: YouTube Channel Manager - SEO and Paid Growth Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
The Change Doctor, led by Dr. Michelle Rozen, is a pioneering force in personal development and transformation. We empower leaders and individuals to embrace change, overcome challenges, and achieve their highest potential.

Our YouTube channel is vital to our mission, providing valuable content that inspires and educates our growing audience. We seek a dedicated and innovative YouTube Channel Manager to grow our channel through expert SEO and paid strategies.

Role Overview:
As the YouTube Channel Manager, you will be responsible for optimizing our channel for search and implementing paid strategies to increase visibility, engagement, and subscribers. Your expertise in YouTube SEO, data analytics, and digital marketing will be essential in achieving our growth objectives.

Key Responsibilities:
SEO Optimization:
Conduct keyword research to identify high-impact terms.
Optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails.
Develop and implement strategies to improve video rankings and channel discoverability.

Content Strategy:
Collaborate with Dr. Michelle Roen and the content team to plan and execute a content calendar.
Analyze performance data to refine content strategies and improve engagement.

Paid Campaigns:
Plan, execute, and manage YouTube ad campaigns (Google Ads).
Optimize ad spending to maximize ROI and achieve growth targets.
Analytics and Reporting:
Monitor and analyze channel metrics and campaign performance.
Provide regular reports with insights and recommendations for improvement.

Community Engagement:
Engage with the audience through comments and community posts.
Foster a positive and interactive community environment.
Qualifications:

Proven experience managing and growing YouTube channels.
Strong knowledge of YouTube SEO and paid advertising strategies.
Proficient in using YouTube Analytics and other SEO tools.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Creative mindset with a passion for personal development and transformation.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Preferred Skills: (not a must)

Experience with graphic design tools (e.g., Photoshop, Canva) for creating engaging thumbnails. -A PLUS
Familiarity with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Understanding of social media marketing and its integration with YouTube strategies.



Posted On: June 26, 2024 12:25 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Campaign Management, Video Advertising, Education, Google Analytics, YouTube, SEO Keyword Research, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Campaign Management, Video Advertising, Education, Google Analytics, YouTube, SEO Keyword Research, Marketing Strategy, YouTube Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
